name: imageViewer_show
description: This function is used to display content from one SmartThings device on another video_capable SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the source device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the source device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the source device to display its content.

parameters.name: consumerLocation
parameters.description: The location where the consumer device is located.

parameters.name: consumerDevice
parameters.description: The name or type of the consumer device to display the content on.
